data.text: Tie: Nyansa refrɛ.
Ɛkwan no so, sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ,
apono a ɛkɔ kuropɔn no mu ho,
“Ao, mo mmarimma na meteam mefrɛ;
Mo a moyɛ ntetekwaa, mo mma mo ani nte;
Montie, na mewɔ nsɛm pa bi ka kyerɛ mo;
Mʼano ka deɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ,
Mʼano mu nsɛm nyinaa yɛ pɛ;
Ne nyinaa mu da hɔ ma deɛ ɔwɔ nhunumu;
Mompo dwetɛ na momfa mʼakwankyerɛ,
Ɛfiri sɛ nimdeɛ som bo sene mmota,
“Me, nyansa, mene aniteɛ na ɛteɛ;
Sɛ wɔsuro Awurade ɛne sɛ wɔkyiri bɔne;
Afotuo ne atemmuo pa wɔ me;
Me so na ahemfo nam di adeɛ
Mmapɔmma de me bu ɔman
Medɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ me,
Ahonyadeɛ ne animuonyam wɔ me nkyɛn,
Mʼaba yɛ sene sikakɔkɔɔ amapa;
Tenenee akwan so na menam
mede ahodeɛ ma wɔn a wɔdɔ me
“Awurade bɔɔ me sɛ nʼabɔdeɛ mu abakan
ɔyii me sii hɔ firi tete,
Wɔwoo me ansa na wɔrebɔ ɛpo kakraka no
ansa na wɔde mmepɔ resisi hɔ,
ansa na ɔbɔɔ asase ne ne mfuo
Mewɔ hɔ ansa na wɔbɔɔ soro,
ɛberɛ a ɔbɔɔ omununkum wɔ soro
ɛberɛ a ɔtwaa hyeɛ maa ɛpo
na meyɛ odwumfoɔ a mete ne nkyɛn.
na mʼani gye wɔ ne ewiase nyinaa mu
“Enti me mma, montie me;
Montie mʼakwankyerɛ na monhunu nyansa;
Nhyira ne onipa a ɔtie me,
Na obiara a ɔhunu me no nya nkwa
Na deɛ woanhwehwɛ me no ha ne ho
